title: Native build fails with 3.0.0.CR2
body:
### Describe the bug

If you try to build a native Image with CR2 it fails

Extensions: quarkus-resteasy-reactive, quarkus-container-image-docker, quarkus-arc

### Expected behavior

Should not fail

### Actual behavior

Fails with a null pointer

<details>

<summary>Logs of the build</summary>


</details>

### How to Reproduce?

[demonstrate-build-error.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/11169774/demonstrate-build-error.zip)


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

5.19.0-38-generic

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.6" 2023-01-17 LTS OpenJDK Runtime Environment Corretto-17.0.6.10.1 (build 17.0.6+10-LTS) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Corretto-17.0.6.10.1 (build 17.0.6+10-LTS, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.0.0.CR2

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

 ------------------------------------------------------------ Gradle 8.0.1 ------------------------------------------------------------  Build time:   2023-02-17 20:09:48 UTC Revision:     68959bf76cef4d28c678f2e2085ee84e8647b77a  Kotlin:       1.8.10 Groovy:       3.0.13 Ant:          Apache Ant(TM) version 1.10.11 compiled on July 10 2021 JVM:          11.0.18 (Ubuntu 11.0.18+10-post-Ubuntu-0ubuntu122.04) OS:           Linux 5.19.0-38-generic amd64

### Additional information

_No response_
